thread.title: Kardashian cancels baby shower to support Odom
thread.title_full: Kardashian cancels baby shower to support Odom

title: Kardashian cancels baby shower to support Odom
text:
Share Updated: 9:09 am 
Reality TV star Kim Kardashian has reportedly cancelled her baby shower as her sister Khloe's estranged husband Lamar Odom fights for his life in a hospital. 
Odom was found unconscious by two employees of the Love Ranch South brothel in Nevada on Tuesday afternoon and he had "blood coming from his nose and mouth along with a white substance," according to the Nye County Sheriff's Office. 
Odom remains in a critical condition and unresponsive at the Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas, and his estranged wife Khloe, and her family members Kim, Kourtney, Kendall and Kris Jenner, have flown out to be by his bedside. 
Pregnant Kim was due to celebrate the upcoming birth of her second child with Kanye West this weekend at a pal's Beverly Hills estate, but she has cancelled the bash to support her family in Las Vegas, according to E! Online. 
Odom had reportedly taken cocaine and a sexual enhancement drug during his three-day stay at the brothel, but the results of a toxicology report have not yet been made public. 
Khloe filed for divorce from Odom in 2013 after four years of marriage, but they still remain legally wed. Copyright WENN.com
